conversation.content:
[very excited] Oh my God, we did it! We actually— [laugh] I can't even believe this is real. The final count came in and we raised, um... we raised twice what we thought we would. [pause] Twice. That's not just a little extra, that's— [gasp softly] that's enough for the new pediatric wing AND the equipment they desperately needed.

[warm] You know, when Dr. Martinez called me with the numbers, I just... I literally had to sit down. [sniffle] All those kids are going to get, um, they're going to get so much more than we even hoped for. The MRI machine, the specialized beds, the— [crying while speaking] sorry, I'm getting emotional but it's just... these are actual lives we're changing.

[cheerful] And everyone who showed up tonight! The auction went absolutely crazy. That one couple, they bid, hmm, I think it was thirty thousand on the vacation package? [laugh] I mean, who does that? But they said they wanted to help and they just kept bidding.

[very sincerely] I keep thinking about little Sarah who I met last month, and how her mom was worried about, uh... about whether they'd have the right equipment for her treatment. [relieved] Now they will. They absolutely will.

subject: Your banquet for the children's hospital raising twice the expected funds
